rule: The chatbot must classify any provided input text into one of four predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: Manchester United wins the Premier League after a thrilling final game.
validityText:
The provided input is a single sentence summarizing an event rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a complete news article suitable for classification into specified categories.
